price: Onlara dedim ki: "Rabbinizden bağışlanma dileyin. Çünkü O, çok bağışlayıcıdır.''
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
